medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive right lower quadrant abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 12 hours prior to admission with progressive abdominal pain. The patient has experienced similar pain in the past that resolved within hours, but this episode is much worse and is associated with chills, nausea, and vomiting. Denies dysuria. Noted bowel movement the day before described as softer than normal.
medical_history.family_history: No inflammatory bowel disease or gastrointestinal issues; grandfather had colon cancer.
